title: UK polls point to a massive win for Labour. The party doesn't want voters to think victory is a done deal
content: Expectations have mounted that the Labour Party will win the U.K.'s upcoming snap election ever since Conservative Prime Minister Rishi Sunak called the vote.
summary: Expectations have mounted that the Labour Party will win the U.K.'s upcoming snap election ever since Conservative Prime Minister Rishi Sunak called the vote.

title: Revolut CEO confident on UK bank license approval as fintech firm hits record $545 million profit

summary: Revolut's CEO Nikolay Storonsky said he is optimistic about the fintech firm's chances of being granted a U.K. banking license.

title: China's young people are 'revenge saving' even as Gen Zers around the world are piling up debt

summary: Rather than splurging on impulsive purchases, China's young are saving ferociously as the world's second-largest economy remains in the doldrums.

title: Iran faces runoff election between reformist and ultra-conservative presidential candidates amid record low turnout
content: Amid record-low voter turnout of around 40% in the election's first round Friday, two dramatically different candidates came out on top.

title: Millennials are ‘very ill-prepared’ to be the richest generation in history, wealth manager says

title: Americans and Japanese take far less time off — but Europeans say they're more 'vacation deprived'

title: Gen Z is ditching dating apps to meet people in real life. Here are 4 top tips.

title: Collapsed bitcoin exchange Mt. Gox is about to unload $9 billion of coins onto the market. Here's what it means

title: Chewy shares fall nearly 7% as the boost from Roaring Kitty's new stake diminishes
